speaker: Danielle
content: Why can't we ever have normal soup?

speaker: Bree
content: Danielle, there is nothing abnormal about basil puree.
mark: basil puree 罗勒汤  basil 罗勒属植物 puree 浓汤；果泥；菜泥

speaker: Danielle
content: Just once, couldn't we have a soup that people have heard of? Like French onion or navy bean.
mark: couldn't we do sth?  我们难道不能做某事吗？
hear of 知道，了解
French onion soup 法式洋葱汤
navy bean 白芸豆 navy 海军；深蓝色；舰队

speaker: Bree
content: First of all, your father can't eat onions. He's deathly allergic. And I won't even dignify your navy bean suggestion. So, how's the Ossobuco?
mark: deathly 致命的，极其，非常
allergic 对……过敏的；过敏引起的，过敏性的；对……极其反感的
I won't even... even是一个副词，一般放在助动词（如 won't）之后，实义动词之前。
dignify 使有尊严，使高贵；使显得堂皇，抬高……的身价
dignify a suggestion 表示认真对待、郑重考虑某个建议，给予该建议足够的尊重或认可，使其显得重要、值得关注，而不是轻易忽视它。
Ossobuco 经典的意大利菜肴，烩牛膝或炖小牛膝

speaker: Andrew
content: It's OK.

speaker: Bree
content: It's OK? Andrew, I spent 3 hours cooking this meal. How do you think it makes me feel when you say "it's OK" in that sullen tone?
mark: How do you think it makes me feel when... 你认为当…的时候，这让我有怎样的感受？
in that sullen tone 用那种闷闷不乐的/阴沉的语气
sullen 愠怒的，不高兴的；（天气）阴沉的；沉闷的
tone 语气，腔调，口吻；气氛，基调，风格

speaker: Andrew
content: Who asked you to spend 3 hours on dinner?
mark: who asked you to do sth? 谁让你做某事的？

speaker: Bree
content: Excuse me?

speaker: Andrew
content: Tim Harper's mom gets home from work, pops open a can of pork and beans, and boom, they're eating, everyone's happy.
mark: get home 回家 get home from work 下班回家
pops 砰砰声 boom 梆梆声
pork and beans 猪肉豆 pork 猪肉

speaker: Bree
content: You'd rather I serve pork and beans?
mark: would rather that 宁愿；宁可，其后的从句常用虚拟语气；此处serve是一般现在时，表达现在或将来的一种意愿情况

speaker: Danielle
content: Apologize now. I am begging.

speaker: Andrew
content: I'm saying, do you always have to serve cuisine? Can't we ever just have food?
mark: cuisine 这里指经过精心准备、具有特定烹饪风格或特色的菜肴

speaker: Bree
content: Are you doing drugs?
mark: Are you doing drugs? 你在吸毒吗？ do drugs 吸食毒品
Are you drugging? 你正在给…… 下药吗

speaker: Andrew
content: What?

speaker: Bree
content: Change in behavior is one of the warning signs, and you have been as fresh as paint for the last six months.
mark: as fresh as paint 状态良好，看起来新鲜  paint 油漆，涂料；绘画颜料

speaker: Bree
content: That certainly would explain why you're always locked in the bathroom.

speaker: Danielle
content: Trust me, that is not what he is doing.

speaker: Andrew
content: Shut up. Mom, I'm not the one with the problem here, alright? You're the one always acting like she's running for mayor of Stepford.
mark: You’re the one doing sth 你才是那个正在做某事的人 == you’re the one who is doing sth
run for 参选，寻求，逃离
mayor 镇长，市长
Stepford 地名：斯特福德市

speaker: Bree
content: Rex, Seeing as you're the head of this household, I would really appreciate you saying something.
mark: Seeing as 既然，鉴于
the head of this household 一家之主
household 家庭，一家人；家务；王室
appreciate 欣赏，鉴赏；理解，明白；感谢，感激；升值，增值
would appreciate sb doing sth 希望某人做某事；会感激某人做某事
I would really appreciate you saying something. == I would really appreciate it if you said something.

speaker: Rex
content: Pass the salt?
